LABEL: 0x2D1
STRING: 「Can you imagine my surprise?」

LABEL: 0x2F9
STRING: 「Since there were no people around anywhere when I woke up.」

LABEL: 0x32D
STRING: 「And since the door to the wheelhouse was wide open.」

LABEL: 0x35E
STRING: She kept putting emphasis on "since."

LABEL: 0x390
STRING: She brought us along from the crew room to the wheelhouse, or maybe "dragged" was the better word for it.

LABEL: 0x3CE
STRING: Every step she took made me straighten my back.

LABEL: 0x482
STRING: 「Now then――」

LABEL: 0x49C
STRING: 「Could you explain to me what you all were doing?」

LABEL: 0x53D
STRING: 「And why you did it?」

LABEL: 0x574
STRING: The smile on her face was quite lovely, but...

LABEL: 0x5B2
STRING: What was with this... menacing aura?

LABEL: 0x5D8
STRING: I felt some sort of pressure... Was it the water pressure, maybe?

LABEL: 0x5FC
STRING: This really wasn't the time to be saying things like, "The deep sea really is something else!" was it?

LABEL: 0x63E
STRING: 「Um, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x66F
STRING: 「Yes, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x68D
STRING: 「Could you explain it to me this instant?」

LABEL: 0x6BD
STRING: 「Why the hell you left the ship in such a risky state until now?」

LABEL: 0x710
STRING: Wow, what a smile that was.

LABEL: 0x72E
STRING: She smiled from ear to ear. Captivating.

LABEL: 0x75C
STRING: The veins popping on her forehead must have been my imagination... That had to be it.

LABEL: 0x798
STRING: 「Well, uhh...」

LABEL: 0x7B8
STRING: 「That's not it...」

LABEL: 0x842
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x860
STRING: 「Don't tell me you're going to say something like, "We didn't mean to" after all this?」

LABEL: 0x8BE
STRING: 「Whatever you say, it makes no difference to the situation we find ourselves in, does it?」

LABEL: 0x907
STRING: 「That's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x99D
STRING: 「But what?」

LABEL: 0x9D4
STRING: Ah, it was no good.

LABEL: 0x9EE
STRING: She was definitely angry.

LABEL: 0xA18
STRING: Angrier than ever before.

LABEL: 0xA3E
STRING: It had been a while since I'd been this scared of a living being.

LABEL: 0xA78
STRING: How did she manage to be scarier than the deep-sea creatures at the bottom of this sea?

LABEL: 0xB3F
STRING: 「What's wrong, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0xBD6
STRING: 「Why are you so quiet?」

LABEL: 0xC77
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0xCFD
STRING: 「Katagiri――」

LABEL: 0xD26
STRING: 「Hey, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0xD61
STRING: Hiragino came to my rescue as I was trying to disappear into the floor.

LABEL: 0xD8F
STRING: Yukari grabbed the hand that reached for her head with both of her arms.

LABEL: 0xEA4
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei?」

LABEL: 0xEBE
STRING: 「What's with the hand?」

LABEL: 0xEEF
STRING: 「That's my line.」

LABEL: 0xF17
STRING: 「Despite the situation, Katagiri-kun is still a passenger of this ship.」

LABEL: 0xF59
STRING: 「How can you talk to him like that?」

LABEL: 0xFEB
STRING: 「Excuse me?」

LABEL: 0x100A
STRING: Yukari questioned him brazenly.

LABEL: 0x102A
STRING: She didn't let the smile drop off her face, but her attitude toward Hiragino was as harsh as ever.

LABEL: 0x1088
STRING: She must have slept well because she was full of energy.

LABEL: 0x10B8
STRING: A well-slept child is a well-kept child...

LABEL: 0x10D6
STRING: I hope she grows up well...

LABEL: 0x10FA
STRING: ――Let's not go there.

LABEL: 0x1184
STRING: 「Sensei.」

LABEL: 0x11A0
STRING: 「Wasn't it you who said rank didn't matter anymore?」

LABEL: 0x1235
STRING: 「It's true that we boarded the <SHEEP III> as members of crew, but...」

LABEL: 0x1282
STRING: 「Under these circumstances, we should all do what we can as adults.」

LABEL: 0x12DD
STRING: 「And this is what happens when we aren't able to do that.」

LABEL: 0x1389
STRING: 「That's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x1419
STRING: 「B e s i d e s .」

LABEL: 0x1476
STRING: Yukari closed in on Hiragino as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x14A0
STRING: Their toes were less than ten centimeters apart.

LABEL: 0x14D4
STRING: Yet, there was still quite a bit of distance between them... vertically.

LABEL: 0x1506
STRING: Yukari glared aggressively at him despite their obvious height difference. There was no doubt that she was genuinely mad.

LABEL: 0x163D
STRING: 「Besides, you're a crew member too!」

LABEL: 0x1677
STRING: 「And the oldest one at that!」

LABEL: 0x16FE
STRING: 「I was only sleeping for a little while, and this is how things turned out...

LABEL: 0x1787
STRING: Would it kill you to take this more%Nseriously?!」

LABEL: 0x17AD
STRING: 「Aren't you ashamed of yourself?!」

LABEL: 0x17D9
STRING: 「Are you listening, Hiragino-sensei?!」

LABEL: 0x1873
STRING: 「Now, now, don't get mad.」

LABEL: 0x1897
STRING: 「You're ruining your cute face.」

LABEL: 0x18C2
STRING: I couldn't believe he just said that with a straight face.

LABEL: 0x197B
STRING: Yukari froze as if her sharp verbal attacks up to that point had never happened.

LABEL: 0x19B3
STRING: In the blink of an eye, she was dyed bright red up to her ears, and her body began to tremble.

LABEL: 0x1AED
STRING: 「Wh-Wh-Wh-Wh-」

LABEL: 0x1B6D
STRING: 「What are you talking about?!」

LABEL: 0x1BA4
STRING: 「Saying things like that at a time like this...」

LABEL: 0x1C2B
STRING: 「That's... nonsense!」

LABEL: 0x1C4D
STRING: 「Stop messing with me!」

LABEL: 0x1C92
STRING: 「I'm not messing with anyone.」

LABEL: 0x1D72
STRING: 「Oh, come on!」

LABEL: 0x1DD2
STRING: Yukari was shaking her head wildly.

LABEL: 0x1E02
STRING: Looking at her like this, it looked a bit like a child throwing a tantrum at her father.

LABEL: 0x1EC0
STRING: 「All right. I understand.」

LABEL: 0x1F47
STRING: 「I don't need any more apologies or anything, so just explain, please.」

LABEL: 0x1F99
STRING: 「Just what happened while I was asleep?」

LABEL: 0x1FDA
STRING: ...Was that really all right with you, Yukari?

LABEL: 0x2000
STRING: How should I put it... This was a "sub-heroine whose episodes were omitted because of length concerns" kind of feeling.

LABEL: 0x2064
STRING: However, there was nothing to gain from bringing that up.

LABEL: 0x20A2
STRING: Urged on by Yukari and her flushed cheeks, we began our tale.

LABEL: 0x210D
STRING: 「It all started with...」

LABEL: 0x213C
STRING: Hiragino and I talked about what had happened after she fell asleep.

LABEL: 0x2178
STRING: It was just a summary, but we shared everything we knew.

LABEL: 0x21A8
STRING: That said, I didn't tell her that I had left Reiri alone in the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x21F6
STRING: Yukari frowned from just me telling her that I'd let her rest alone in a room.

LABEL: 0x223E
STRING: She looked openly suspicious when we got to the part about catching fish with the slurp gun.

LABEL: 0x236D
STRING: 「You entered the wheelhouse without permission?!」

LABEL: 0x240B
STRING: 「Well, I guess you could put it that way.」

LABEL: 0x24A9
STRING: 「What were you thinking...?」

LABEL: 0x2530
STRING: 「You're both adults, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x2565
STRING: She looked like she couldn't believe it.

LABEL: 0x258F
STRING: Even though she had just woken up, her face was quickly growing tired.

LABEL: 0x264D
STRING: 「But, how did you unlock the door?」

LABEL: 0x26F1
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x2716
STRING: 「The key to the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0x2736
STRING: 「This door can only be unlocked with the master key I have.」

LABEL: 0x2788
STRING: 「How were you able to get inside without the key?」

LABEL: 0x2848
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x28C6
STRING: Hiragino stammered and glanced at me.

LABEL: 0x28F0
STRING: Yukari followed suit and turned toward me.

LABEL: 0x291A
STRING: ...Wait, you're going to make me explain?

LABEL: 0x294C
STRING: What kind of an explanation was he expecting from me?

LABEL: 0x29B8
STRING: That I secretly borrowed the master key from Yukari's breast pocket as she slept...?

LABEL: 0x2A02
STRING: There's no way I could say that!

LABEL: 0x2A2C
STRING: She probably hadn't even realized yet that she'd been robbed of her master key (which was a misleading way to put it).

LABEL: 0x2A92
STRING: Who knew what would happen if I were to reveal that to her now――

LABEL: 0x2AE4
STRING: 「Oh, it was left open.」

LABEL: 0x2B7E
STRING: 「There's no way that would happen.」

LABEL: 0x2BB3
STRING: She squinted her eyes as she looked at me.

LABEL: 0x2BD7
STRING: Her gaze was like she was looking at a triangular corner of a kitchen.

LABEL: 0x2C0F
STRING: I could offer no follow-up if she denied me in two seconds flat.

LABEL: 0x2C64
STRING: Had we lost...?

LABEL: 0x2D47
STRING: 「I-It's true.」

LABEL: 0x2D6F
STRING: Hiragino came to my help.

LABEL: 0x2D93
STRING: It was the simplest follow-up I could think of, but it was better than nothing.

LABEL: 0x2EC6
STRING: 「You know, back then... when you came out of the wheelhouse, you were staggering.」

LABEL: 0x2F14
STRING: 「Maybe your head was in a daze, too?」

LABEL: 0x2F48
STRING: 「Or, how else do you suppose we got into the wheelhouse?」

LABEL: 0x2F99
STRING: That was a really backward way of thinking.

LABEL: 0x2FBB
STRING: Was this guy really a doctor?

LABEL: 0x2FE3
STRING: Couldn't he show a little more wisdom while trying to convince her?

LABEL: 0x3021
STRING: There was no way Yukari would accept that excuse――

LABEL: 0x3138
STRING: 「Right, it seems I was careless.」

LABEL: 0x31C3
STRING: 「I'm sorry about that.」

LABEL: 0x31F8
STRING: Again, Yukari...

LABEL: 0x3214
STRING: Were you really okay with that?

LABEL: 0x3238
STRING: For all her poking and prodding and doubting, she easily believed us when an explanation was presented.

LABEL: 0x3290
STRING: It was like she was too honest...

LABEL: 0x32FA
STRING: Yukari bowed her head.

LABEL: 0x331C
STRING: I felt like I was deceiving an innocent girl, and my heart ached.

LABEL: 0x335E
STRING: But I shouldn't forget that she was older than me...

LABEL: 0x33F8
STRING: 「As long as you understand.」

LABEL: 0x3422
STRING: 「So, we brought the fish we caught to the lobby and cut them up...」

LABEL: 0x34E7
STRING: 「We didn't eat them in the end since they weren't edible.」

LABEL: 0x354A
STRING: ...Was he not going to mention the finger?

LABEL: 0x3572
STRING: Well, it was thrown away in the end, so that was that.

LABEL: 0x35B8
STRING: I didn't think I needed to fear Touri or Tokiwa bringing the matter up, at least.

LABEL: 0x3618
STRING: Hiragino glossed over the fact without going into much detail.

LABEL: 0x365E
STRING: ――Or so it should have been.

LABEL: 0x3708
STRING: 「You caught the fish and cut them...?」

LABEL: 0x3739
STRING: Yukari repeated it quietly.

LABEL: 0x3765
STRING: It was like she had found some special meaning in it.

LABEL: 0x37A5
STRING: Was cooking deep-sea fish really that big of a problem?

LABEL: 0x37FD
STRING: She asked Hiragino something with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x38FE
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x3918
STRING: 「I'm sorry to ask this, but what happened to the fish?」

LABEL: 0x3977
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x39A8
STRING: 「I get that you didn't eat them, but what happened to the remains afterward?」

LABEL: 0x3A11
STRING: 「I got rid of them.」

LABEL: 0x3A2D
STRING: 「I chopped them all up and flushed them down the toilet.」

LABEL: 0x3ACB
STRING: 「What?!」

LABEL: 0x3AEE
STRING: Yukari's expression hardened at his words like she was frightened.

LABEL: 0x3B28
STRING: The blood drained from her flushed cheeks in an instant.

LABEL: 0x3B74
STRING: Her now pale complexion reminded me of Reiri.

LABEL: 0x3BAA
STRING: I chased away her ghastly and sarcastic smile from my mind.

LABEL: 0x3C2B
STRING: 「What should I do...?」

LABEL: 0x3C4B
STRING: 「How do I...?」

LABEL: 0x3C70
STRING: Her mouth trembled quietly as she let out the words.

LABEL: 0x3CB8
STRING: Like an automaton.

LABEL: 0x3CDA
STRING: Or a death rattle――

LABEL: 0x3D02
STRING: All I could feel from her was despair.

LABEL: 0x3D24
STRING: Impatience, unease, fear... Her inner thoughts were a mixture of negative emotions.

LABEL: 0x3D6A
STRING: It was an overflowing aura of negativity.

LABEL: 0x3DDA
STRING: Influenced by her, we weren't able to say anything.

LABEL: 0x3E16
STRING: But... What was the cause?

LABEL: 0x3E44
STRING: Why was she frightened?

LABEL: 0x3E6A
STRING: What was she afraid of?

LABEL: 0x3E8E
STRING: What Hiragino told her was that he'd just cut up some deep-sea fish and thrown them away.

LABEL: 0x3EE0
STRING: What did that mean to her...?

LABEL: 0x3F1E
STRING: Yukari muttered incoherently for a while, and eventually looked up abruptly.

LABEL: 0x4031
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x4050
STRING: In a complete change of character, she firmly closed in on him.

LABEL: 0x408E
STRING: Hiragino responded with surprise at her sudden change.

LABEL: 0x40D3
STRING: 「Let me confirm one thing.」

LABEL: 0x4108
STRING: 「Y-Yeah?」

LABEL: 0x4131
STRING: 「The color...」

LABEL: 0x414B
STRING: 「What color were those fish?」

LABEL: 0x4182
STRING: The... color?

LABEL: 0x419C
STRING: Hearing Yukari's unexpected question, I searched my memory.

LABEL: 0x423E
STRING: 「Even if you ask...」

LABEL: 0x4264
STRING: 「They were pitch-black, or rather, they weren't any particular color.」

LABEL: 0x42A0
STRING: 「They had a slimy luster to them, but they didn't have very distinctive coloring...」

LABEL: 0x434F
STRING: 「――Right?」

LABEL: 0x4372
STRING: Overwhelmed by her menacing look, he asked for my agreement.

LABEL: 0x43AE
STRING: I nodded without hesitation.

LABEL: 0x43D0
STRING: 「Yeah, he's right.」

LABEL: 0x43FA
STRING: 「They were monochrome if anything.」

LABEL: 0x442A
STRING: 「I guess you could say there was zero information...」

LABEL: 0x448A
STRING: I recalled the whole scene that had happened in the lobby.

LABEL: 0x44C2
STRING: The people who were there, aside from Hiragino and me, were Touri and...

LABEL: 0x4500
STRING: 「Come to think of it...」

LABEL: 0x458C
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x45B1
STRING: 「All this talk of colors reminded me...」

LABEL: 0x45CF
STRING: 「Tokiwa was the only one who said something about the fish's "wonderful" color.」

LABEL: 0x4613
STRING: 「Honestly, I have no idea what was so wonderful about them.」

LABEL: 0x4657
STRING: 「She was the only one who seemed to take an interest and make a fuss about the colors.」

LABEL: 0x4703
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san did...?」

LABEL: 0x472C
STRING: 「Well, it's just something she said, so I don't think it matters much.」

LABEL: 0x4778
STRING: It was normal for Tokiwa to say things nobody understood, so there was no need to worry about it.

LABEL: 0x47D8
STRING: It was strange to be excited by the color of a pitch-black fish, but, well, it wasn't impossible.

LABEL: 0x483C
STRING: However, Yukari wasn't even listening to me anymore.

LABEL: 0x48DC
STRING: 「Color...」

LABEL: 0x48F4
STRING: 「Fish...」

LABEL: 0x490C
STRING: 「Wonderful colors...?」

LABEL: 0x4993
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san...」

LABEL: 0x49B3
STRING: 「――She holds the key, after all.」

LABEL: 0x49EA
STRING: Yukari readied the bracelet on her right arm.

LABEL: 0x4A41
STRING: 「POL!」

LABEL: 0x4A58
STRING: 「POL, can you hear me? POL!」

LABEL: 0x4A8D
STRING: There was no response.

LABEL: 0x4AA7
STRING: Not only her wristwatch, but the microphone near the display didn't respond either.

LABEL: 0x4AEF
STRING: Sensing that POL wasn't functioning, Yukari hurried over to the operating version in front of her.

LABEL: 0x4BB2
STRING: 「What about the ship broadcast?!」

LABEL: 0x4BF1
STRING: She activated the panel and made a selection with trembling fingers.

LABEL: 0x4C29
STRING: She tried to use the ship's broadcast but to no avail.

LABEL: 0x4D2A
STRING: 「It hasn't... recovered yet...」

LABEL: 0x4D65
STRING: 「What's wrong, Momoi?」

LABEL: 0x4D8C
STRING: Hiragino called out to her with concern.

LABEL: 0x4DB6
STRING: Yukari raised her voice as if there was no time to spare.

LABEL: 0x4E4E
STRING: 「...Please, call Tokiwa-san here.」

LABEL: 0x4EDF
STRING: 「Now!」

LABEL: 0x4F36
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x4F50
STRING: A shadow came running through the open door to the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x4F94
STRING: A mass of colors folded together.

LABEL: 0x4FB4
STRING: The girl who was called appeared.

LABEL: 0x5037
STRING: 「To-Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x5066
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san――」

LABEL: 0x508B
STRING: Yukari called out to her as soon as she saw her.

LABEL: 0x50B7
STRING: However, Tokiwa raised her palm to stop her.

LABEL: 0x50ED
STRING: Standing in the center of the wheelhouse with everyone watching, she opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x519F
STRING: 「The outside of this window is filled with fish! I can feel it!」

LABEL: 0x51F1
STRING: 「This is a big chance!」

LABEL: 0x521B
STRING: 「Now, reveal yourselves to me, fish, through this wide and clear window!」

LABEL: 0x5280
STRING: Tokiwa shouted and breathed heavily.

LABEL: 0x52A4
STRING: Her happy expression made it seem like she couldn't read the mood.

LABEL: 0x52FA
STRING: I wondered if Yukari was going to snap...

LABEL: 0x532C
STRING: I timidly turned around, and her face...

LABEL: 0x53B5
STRING: ――It was colored with confusion and dismay.

LABEL: 0x53F2
STRING: 「No way...」

LABEL: 0x540E
STRING: 「It can't be...」

LABEL: 0x5430
STRING: Yukari muttered to herself.

LABEL: 0x545C
STRING: Finally, she looked up, taken aback.

LABEL: 0x548E
STRING: 「Please turn off the lights!」

LABEL: 0x54B8
STRING: 「Right now!!」

LABEL: 0x54DB
STRING: 「S-Sure...」

LABEL: 0x5504
STRING: 「Got it.」

LABEL: 0x558A
STRING: Overwhelmed by her demonic tone, Hiragino and I split up and turned off the lights.

LABEL: 0x55D2
STRING: In the meantime, she shut down all the electrical systems emitting light.

LABEL: 0x5693
STRING: The wheelhouse was enveloped in darkness, leaving only the bare minimum of control functions active.

LABEL: 0x56D3
STRING: The display at the front of the wheelhouse was turned off as well.

LABEL: 0x570F
STRING: A large window appeared from behind the turned-off display.

LABEL: 0x574F
STRING: 「Ohhh...」

LABEL: 0x5769
STRING: I had seen it in the observation deck, but this huge water-resistant glass was overwhelming.

LABEL: 0x57AD
STRING: Even though we were underwater, it felt like we were looking inside an aquarium.

LABEL: 0x580B
STRING: That said, you couldn't see anything beyond the window in this deep sea.

LABEL: 0x58D1
STRING: That wasn't quite true.

LABEL: 0x597F
STRING: 「Nhyoooooooooooo!」

LABEL: 0x59B2
STRING: 「Woah...」

LABEL: 0x5A59
STRING: On the other side of the window, specks of light began to appear from far away.

LABEL: 0x5A93
STRING: One by one, they floated upward.

LABEL: 0x5B1C
STRING: Each one was a small, weak light.

LABEL: 0x5B48
STRING: They drifted back and forth,

LABEL: 0x5B6C
STRING: looking like they might disappear at any moment.

LABEL: 0x5BF1
STRING: Vague,

LABEL: 0x5C09
STRING: ephemeral

LABEL: 0x5C1F
STRING: light.

LABEL: 0x5C31
STRING: However.

LABEL: 0x5C47
STRING: Several lights flash in rapid succession.

LABEL: 0x5C71
STRING: It wasn't just ten or twenty.

LABEL: 0x5C91
STRING: A hundred...

LABEL: 0x5CA5
STRING: No, a thousand...

LABEL: 0x5CBF
STRING: No, even more than that.

LABEL: 0x5CE7
STRING: Countless specks of light spread out before us, drawing each other in as they grew in size.

LABEL: 0x5D33
STRING: Was this... bioluminescence?

LABEL: 0x5D5F
STRING: No, of course it was.

LABEL: 0x5D87
STRING: I'd never seen this pattern before, but...

LABEL: 0x5DB7
STRING: That light was definitely proof of life.

LABEL: 0x5E40
STRING: Living in the depths of this darkness,

LABEL: 0x5E66
STRING: were countless lives...

LABEL: 0x5E84
STRING: The lights, which were speckled at first,

LABEL: 0x5EAA
STRING: transformed into a starry sky centered around a single moon before long.

LABEL: 0x5EE6
STRING: The light source continued to grow even larger.

LABEL: 0x5F0E
STRING: The moon became the sun.

LABEL: 0x5F2C
STRING: The sun illuminated the sky.

LABEL: 0x5F50
STRING: The glowing sky,

LABEL: 0x5F6C
STRING: the light, approached us,

LABEL: 0x5F88
STRING: as if to envelop the <SHEEP III>――

LABEL: 0x6029
STRING: 「I can't believe this...」

LABEL: 0x605A
STRING: 「It's so wonderful...!」

LABEL: 0x6087
STRING: I hated to admit it, but...

LABEL: 0x60A1
STRING: Just this once, I agreed with her.

LABEL: 0x60CD
STRING: It was so wonderful...

LABEL: 0x60EF
STRING: We were captivated by the scene in front of us for a while.

LABEL: 0x6127
STRING: All I could do was try and burn this image into my mind with my mouth hanging open.

LABEL: 0x6233
STRING: ――In the midst of that.

LABEL: 0x624F
STRING: I remembered.

LABEL: 0x6273
STRING: That light on the "Fourth Day."

LABEL: 0x6299
STRING: The brilliance of the stars that filled the heavens.

LABEL: 0x62BD
STRING: The pitch-black sky that lit up like midday in an instant.

LABEL: 0x62F9
STRING: And this light enveloping the depths of this darkness――

LABEL: 0x6399
STRING: The light was squirming.

LABEL: 0x63B1
STRING: It was alive.

LABEL: 0x63CB
STRING: Each and every one of those points of light, to think that they were all alive...

LABEL: 0x63F9
STRING: How... repulsive.

LABEL: 0x641D
STRING: Ominous... sacred light.

LABEL: 0x643F
STRING: Proof of life.

LABEL: 0x64F7
STRING: I glanced at Yukari beside me and saw her biting her lip hard.

LABEL: 0x65AE
STRING: 「I knew it... This place...」

LABEL: 0x65D0
STRING: 「It's the same as back then...」

LABEL: 0x65F7
STRING: Back then...?

LABEL: 0x6613
STRING: Her whispers suddenly caught my ear.

LABEL: 0x6655
STRING: Did she remember the "Fourth Day," too...?

LABEL: 0x668B
STRING: Or maybe it was something else entirely――

LABEL: 0x6742
STRING: 「What is this...?」

LABEL: 0x6767
STRING: Hiragino just stood there in confusion.

LABEL: 0x679D
STRING: I understood this was an unusual situation, but there was nothing we could do about it.

LABEL: 0x67E3
STRING: And, of course, there was no way to expect this.

LABEL: 0x6846
STRING: 「――Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x6869
STRING: Her voice was not for herself this time.

LABEL: 0x68A1
STRING: Yukari tugged on my sleeve roughly as I stood there dumbfounded.

LABEL: 0x68D7
STRING: When I came to my senses and turned around, I saw her looking up at me with a desperate expression.

LABEL: 0x699C
STRING: 「Katagiri-san... Please.」

LABEL: 0x69C9
STRING: 「W-What?」

LABEL: 0x69F6
STRING: 「Can we get the communications back online?」

LABEL: 0x6A22
STRING: 「Right now.」

LABEL: 0x6A47
STRING: Why did she bring that up now?

LABEL: 0x6A67
STRING: It was an honest question, but I couldn't bring myself to ask her.

LABEL: 0x6A9D
STRING: She was so earnest that I flinched.

LABEL: 0x6AD1
STRING: If I had to say whether I could fix it or not...

LABEL: 0x6AFF
STRING: 「I'll give it a try.」

LABEL: 0x6B37
STRING: The disconnection earlier was almost certainly because of Reiri.

LABEL: 0x6B7B
STRING: That said, the method she used was extremely rudimentary――

LABEL: 0x6BB9
STRING: There were plenty of ways to fix it.

LABEL: 0x6C5C
STRING: I sat down in the corner of the wheelhouse, restored the electrical system, and booted up the machine in my hands――

LABEL: 0x6CB8
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x6CD0
STRING: ...Or so I thought, but the system wouldn't activate at all.

LABEL: 0x6D04
STRING: Was the trap set by Reiri still working?

LABEL: 0x6D3E
STRING: I called it a trap, but it was simply sending data through the line...

LABEL: 0x6D9C
STRING: For that to work, the data had to pass through the network first.

LABEL: 0x6DE8
STRING: 「In order to do that...」

LABEL: 0x6E08
STRING: The machine centrally managing the network within the submarine was independent of the main machines and communication equipment.

LABEL: 0x6E76
STRING: The machine in front of me, that is to say.

LABEL: 0x6E94
STRING: I reached out to display the network.

LABEL: 0x6EC6
STRING: A diagram was brought up.

LABEL: 0x6EE6
STRING: It was a network isolated from the outside world.

LABEL: 0x6F12
STRING: Even in this closed environment,

LABEL: 0x6F3A
STRING: I completely disconnected and isolated the computer in the library from the rest of the network.

LABEL: 0x6F90
STRING: With this, the route Reiri had used to interfere was cut off.

LABEL: 0x6FC6
STRING: Now, if I started up the main machine――

LABEL: 0x7059
STRING: 「...All right!」

LABEL: 0x7075
STRING: It turned on without a hitch.

LABEL: 0x7097
STRING: I was glad I wasn't stripped of my authority...

LABEL: 0x719E
STRING: 「You fixed it already?!」

LABEL: 0x71CD
STRING: 「Yes, looks that way.」

LABEL: 0x71FC
STRING: 「I knew you could do it...!」

LABEL: 0x7259
STRING: Yukari raised her voice in surprise.

LABEL: 0x727B
STRING: I could hear the respect in her voice... but I was the one who was most surprised by how quickly it was restored.

LABEL: 0x72C9
STRING: It was so easy.

LABEL: 0x72F9
STRING: Still, why had I forgotten to connect the comms?

LABEL: 0x7341
STRING: Even though I came here earlier...

LABEL: 0x7371
STRING: 「Anyway, there's no longer any factor preventing us from communicating with the outside world.」

LABEL: 0x73AF
STRING: 「Yukari-san, can I leave the rest to you?」

LABEL: 0x744D
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x7468
STRING: Yukari sent out a ping with practiced ease.

LABEL: 0x750C
STRING: There was no response.

LABEL: 0x7543
STRING: She tried it two, three more times.

LABEL: 0x757C
STRING: 「Please... Connect...!」

LABEL: 0x75B4
STRING: Yukari put her hands together in prayer.

LABEL: 0x75D6
STRING: She was desperate.

LABEL: 0x75EC
STRING: Seeing her like that, I felt a quiet discomfort.

LABEL: 0x7620
STRING: Well, of course. I knew we wanted to contact the surface and ask for help, but...

LABEL: 0x766C
STRING: This felt so abrupt.

LABEL: 0x76AE
STRING: The situation inside the <SHEEP III> was stable for now.

LABEL: 0x76D9
STRING: I didn't see a reason why we had to get out of here right this instant, but...

LABEL: 0x77A9
STRING: 『...This is <Yuunagi>. Respond.』

LABEL: 0x77E1
STRING: The voice of the exploration vessel.

LABEL: 0x77FB
STRING: We were connected...

LABEL: 0x7815
STRING: Once again, too easily.

LABEL: 0x7847
STRING: I mean, we were the ones who'd cut the transmission, so I could tell it would connect if we retried, but...

LABEL: 0x78AB
STRING: No matter how you looked at it, it was weird how smoothly things were going.

LABEL: 0x7950
STRING: It was as if we were in a scenario written by someone else.

LABEL: 0x7990
STRING: Was I overthinking it?

LABEL: 0x79B0
STRING: "Ask, and it shall be given to you"――

LABEL: 0x79DE
STRING: Did this mean God hadn't abandoned us...?

LABEL: 0x7A71
STRING: Yukari grabbed the microphone and shouted.

LABEL: 0x7B11
STRING: 「This is the <SHEEP III>. Can you hear me?!」

LABEL: 0x7B7F
STRING: Hearing her voice, the other side of the radio went noisy.

LABEL: 0x7BB7
STRING: There was the rattling of people moving, and after a while, there was a reply.

LABEL: 0x7BFD
STRING: 『Momoi, right?』

LABEL: 0x7C17
STRING: 『It's me.』

LABEL: 0x7C2D
STRING: 『What have you been doing all this time?』

LABEL: 0x7C51
STRING: It was a different voice from before.

LABEL: 0x7C71
STRING: Was that her boss?

LABEL: 0x7C91
STRING: I could tell there were people from ROMLES on the exploration vessel, but...

LABEL: 0x7CCD
STRING: What was going on with them questioning us like this...?

LABEL: 0x7D15
STRING: Yukari didn't seem to have any suspicions about that fact as she continued to communicate.

LABEL: 0x7DCB
STRING: 「I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x7DE7
STRING: 「More importantly, I have something to report.」

LABEL: 0x7E27
STRING: 「It's about <COOS>――」

LABEL: 0x7EAA
STRING: 「Bioluminescence has been confirmed in the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x7EF7
STRING: There was a moment of silence.

LABEL: 0x7F11
STRING: I could tell from the static that the inside of <Yuunagi> was enveloped in an unsettled atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x7F5F
STRING: <COOS>... I didn't recognize that word.

LABEL: 0x7F97
STRING: ...What was it she said?

LABEL: 0x7FBF
STRING: After a moment, the voice from the search vessel reached us again.

LABEL: 0x7FF9
STRING: 『...I understand the situation.』

LABEL: 0x801D
STRING: 『Calm down for now, Momoi.』

LABEL: 0x8049
STRING: 『We're sending a rescue ship right now.』

LABEL: 0x8075
STRING: 『Until then...』

LABEL: 0x8093
STRING: 『...Hang in there.』

LABEL: 0x80B5
STRING: 『From now on, please be careful not to lose communication.』

LABEL: 0x8102
STRING: 「Understood.」

LABEL: 0x8121
STRING: Yukari responded firmly, but her voice was trembling.

LABEL: 0x8157
STRING: She was sweating.

LABEL: 0x8175
STRING: Perhaps feeling her nervousness, <Yuunagi> continued speaking.

LABEL: 0x81BB
STRING: 『Don't worry.』

LABEL: 0x81D9
STRING: 『As long as you don't make direct contact, there's no problem.』

LABEL: 0x8207
STRING: 『More importantly――』

LABEL: 0x8225
STRING: 『What's become of <Alice>?』

LABEL: 0x8262
STRING: 「Oh, about that――」

LABEL: 0x82E6
STRING: Yukari hesitated and gave me a guilty look.

LABEL: 0x831E
STRING: <Alice>――

LABEL: 0x833A
STRING: ――A word that sounded familiar.

LABEL: 0x843F
STRING: Hadn't I heard it in the chaotic observation deck when the <SHEEP III> sank?

LABEL: 0x8482
STRING: This <Alice> that man had been looking for...

LABEL: 0x84B0
STRING: I still hadn't forgotten his desperate expression.

LABEL: 0x85A6
STRING: But still...

LABEL: 0x85C4
STRING: At this point in time, at the bottom of the sea like this...

LABEL: 0x85F2
STRING: ...What in the world were these people hiding?

LABEL: 0x861C
STRING: I felt a little irritated.

LABEL: 0x86B8
STRING: 「No... We still don't know about its whereabouts.」

LABEL: 0x86E6
STRING: 「Most likely, during yesterday's accident――」

LABEL: 0x871B
STRING: 『I see...』

LABEL: 0x8737
STRING: Silence fell once more.

LABEL: 0x8755
STRING: I had no idea what exactly they meant by <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x879B
STRING: But I could gather from their conversation that it was a serious matter.

LABEL: 0x887C
STRING: 「The light...」

LABEL: 0x889B
STRING: 『What is it?』

LABEL: 0x88C6
STRING: 「No, um...」

LABEL: 0x88E2
STRING: 「The bioluminescence... It's not normal.」

LABEL: 0x8923
STRING: 『Do you... have more details?』

LABEL: 0x894F
STRING: 『W――ight――al?』

LABEL: 0x897B
STRING: 『He――e――ry――s.』

LABEL: 0x8A11
STRING: 「<Yuunagi>?」

LABEL: 0x8A31
STRING: 「Can you hear me?!」

LABEL: 0x8AD2
STRING: The noise from the radio vanished.

LABEL: 0x8B27
STRING: 「...<Yuunagi>?」

LABEL: 0x8BA8
STRING: 「<Yuunagi>! This is <SHEEP III>!」

LABEL: 0x8BDD
STRING: 「Please reply, <Yuunagi>!!」

LABEL: 0x8C32
STRING: No way.

LABEL: 0x8C48
STRING: The transmission cut off.

LABEL: 0x8C64
STRING: What happened this time...?

LABEL: 0x8C92
STRING: 「Change seats with me!」

LABEL: 0x8CB6
STRING: I pushed Yukari away before I could finish.

LABEL: 0x8CE8
STRING: Was this Reiri's doing again?

LABEL: 0x8D0E
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x8D26
STRING: ...It couldn't be.

LABEL: 0x8D44
STRING: The library's computer terminal was completely disconnected.

LABEL: 0x8D82
STRING: There was no other place you could connect to the network from the outside.

LABEL: 0x8DCA
STRING: In fact――

LABEL: 0x8DE8
STRING: I displayed the network diagram.

LABEL: 0x8E16
STRING: As far as I could tell, there was nothing out of the ordinary.

LABEL: 0x8E42
STRING: Nothing had changed since then.

LABEL: 0x8E72
STRING: And, the pings from the <SHEEP III> were being transmitted without issue...

LABEL: 0x8EB9
STRING: At the very least, there was nothing wrong with the system.

LABEL: 0x8EFB
STRING: So why on earth did our transmission cut out――

LABEL: 0x8F9F
STRING: 「Please!」

LABEL: 0x8FC4
STRING: Yukari, peering at me from the sidelines, let out a voice that sounded like a scream.

LABEL: 0x900F
STRING: 「Hurry up and fix it!」

LABEL: 0x903A
STRING: 「Even if you say that...」

LABEL: 0x9073
STRING: 「But you did it so quickly earlier!」

LABEL: 0x90B8
STRING: 「Things are different now!」

LABEL: 0x90E4
STRING: 「I don't know why the call cut off...」

LABEL: 0x912E
STRING: ――I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x91A9
STRING: Was it Reiri, after all?

LABEL: 0x922E
STRING: That twisted grin passed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x9262
STRING: It wouldn't be strange for her to be able to take advantage of our blind spot and disable the communication functions.

LABEL: 0x92DC
STRING: If it was her...

LABEL: 0x9355
STRING: 「Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x93DB
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x93FA
STRING: 「Can you go and get Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x9439
STRING: 「...Reiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x9460
STRING: He gave me a dubious look.

LABEL: 0x9482
STRING: Reiri hadn't shown her true colors to him or Yukari.

LABEL: 0x94C0
STRING: He didn't seem to have a clear idea why I wanted her here in this situation.

LABEL: 0x951A
STRING: 「I don't know what caused the current communication problem, but...」

LABEL: 0x9556
STRING: 「...I can't quite put it into words, but she might know something.」

LABEL: 0x95A2
STRING: 「I need her help.」

LABEL: 0x95D7
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x9652
STRING: 「All right. Just give me a minute.」

LABEL: 0x96A1
STRING: No sooner had he finished did Hiragino dash out of the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x96DF
STRING: My vague words must have sounded very suspicious.

LABEL: 0x971D
STRING: He must have had his doubts as well.

LABEL: 0x974B
STRING: Nevertheless, he believed in me.

LABEL: 0x9785
STRING: Even knowing everything I'd done up until now.

LABEL: 0x97C9
STRING: ...I was grateful.

LABEL: 0x97E7
STRING: In the end, was it really the work of Reiri that the transmission had cut off?

LABEL: 0x9829
STRING: I didn't know if that was true.

LABEL: 0x9849
STRING: But, if she had done something again...

LABEL: 0x9883
STRING: Asking her straight up would no doubt be the shortest route.

LABEL: 0x9925
STRING: 「Reiri-chan... Reiri-chan.」

LABEL: 0x994D
STRING: 「So, Reiri-chan is coming here.」

LABEL: 0x99D6
STRING: 「How nice...」

LABEL: 0x99FB
STRING: She looked awfully happy...

LABEL: 0x9A1B
STRING: Tokiwa continued her high-tension soliloquy.

LABEL: 0x9AC8
STRING: This reminded me of her "dark love" thing from earlier.

LABEL: 0x9BAE
STRING: I felt a bit uneasy about this catastrophe duo becoming friends.

LABEL: 0x9C32
STRING: I might be wrong, but...

LABEL: 0x9C5A
STRING: The scariest thing in this deep sea

LABEL: 0x9C86
STRING: seemed to be either our little chief attendant,

LABEL: 0x9CC6
STRING: or this pair of girls who just happened to be on the same ship...

LABEL: 0x9D6E
STRING: 「I'm back.」

LABEL: 0x9E55
STRING: 「Good morning, everyone!」

LABEL: 0x9E7E
STRING: Hiragino made his return.

LABEL: 0x9E9E
STRING: Reiri was trotting along behind him.

LABEL: 0x9ED2
STRING: And lastly, there was Touri chasing after her.

LABEL: 0x9FEC
STRING: Touri stepped into the wheelhouse with a smile on her face.

LABEL: 0xA024
STRING: She immediately sensed the strangely serious atmosphere in the room.

LABEL: 0xA098
STRING: She clung to Reiri's shoulder but was shaken off by her.

LABEL: 0xA0E7
STRING: 「Whaaat...?」

LABEL: 0xA10A
STRING: She looked downcast for a moment, but...

LABEL: 0xA12E
STRING: When she noticed the lights outside the window, her eyes lit up.

LABEL: 0xA235
STRING: 「Th-This light――」

LABEL: 0xA25A
STRING: A wriggling mass of light.

LABEL: 0xA274
STRING: If you suddenly showed that to me without any explanation, I wouldn't be able to speak either.

LABEL: 0xA2C8
STRING: For a while, she just stared out the large window.

LABEL: 0xA2FA
STRING: Her mouth hung open, and she didn't say a thing.

LABEL: 0xA33E
STRING: Beside her was Reiri, standing quietly, who didn't seem particularly excited.

LABEL: 0xA3B8
STRING: She looked out the window, narrowed her eyes, and glanced at me.

LABEL: 0xA460
STRING: 「This... What's going on?」

LABEL: 0xA48C
STRING: 「Did something happen?」

LABEL: 0xA4B3
STRING: 「Sorry, but I'm not entirely sure either.」

LABEL: 0xA4F3
STRING: 「More importantly, take a look at this.」

LABEL: 0xA51F
STRING: I would explain it to her later.

LABEL: 0xA539
STRING: I guided Reiri to the control panel.

LABEL: 0xA585
STRING: 「Look at this.」

LABEL: 0xA5AD
STRING: 「...What do you think?」

LABEL: 0xA5CD
STRING: If this was your doing, do something about it.

LABEL: 0xA601
STRING: That was my unspoken intent.

LABEL: 0xA62D
STRING: Had she realized what I was getting at...? No.

LABEL: 0xA665
STRING: There's no way she wouldn't notice.

LABEL: 0xA720
STRING: Peering at the screen, she confirmed that the transmission had been cut off.

LABEL: 0xA764
STRING: The corners of her mouth turned up into a grin as she spoke.

LABEL: 0xA808
STRING: 「I don't know.」

LABEL: 0xA82C
STRING: 「There's no way I'd know.」

LABEL: 0xA84E
STRING: 「...Why did you think I would, Katagiri?」

LABEL: 0xA893
STRING: Reiri asked while smiling.

LABEL: 0xA8B7
STRING: Was she playing around? Was she trying to provoke me?

LABEL: 0xA8DD
STRING: In any case, she was definitely amused by the situation.

LABEL: 0xA91F
STRING: Even while under suspicion, she was like this...

LABEL: 0xA959
STRING: 「Reiri... You...」

LABEL: 0xA977
STRING: Which was it, I wondered...

LABEL: 0xA99D
STRING: Was she trying to dodge the fact that it was her?

LABEL: 0xA9D7
STRING: Or maybe she really didn't know and was just being honest.

LABEL: 0xAA19
STRING: The only thing I could tell from the faint smile on her face...

LABEL: 0xAA5D
STRING: ...Was that she was amused by my confusion.

LABEL: 0xAB0F
STRING: 「He he...」

LABEL: 0xAB2E
STRING: 「What's so funny?」

LABEL: 0xAB5B
STRING: 「No, it's nothing.」

LABEL: 0xAB80
STRING: I didn't get it at all.

LABEL: 0xABA8
STRING: However, her ability to get on my nerves was first-class.

LABEL: 0xABF2
STRING: Just as I was entertaining the thought of throwing her out of the ship and into the sea,

LABEL: 0xAC3A
STRING: Reiri smoothly held out her supple finger and pointed to the monitor in front of her.

LABEL: 0xACF0
STRING: 「I don't know exactly, but what I can say is this...」

LABEL: 0xAD2C
STRING: 「Nine times out of then, this is because of trouble on the surface.」

LABEL: 0xAD71
STRING: 「What's your basis for that?」

LABEL: 0xADFB
STRING: 「Well, there are no problems here, are there?」

LABEL: 0xAE32
STRING: That was the same conclusion I came to.

LABEL: 0xAE66
STRING: There was a possibility that Reiri was hiding something,

LABEL: 0xAE9E
STRING: but at any rate, there was no way to be sure without knowing what was happening on the surface.

LABEL: 0xAEEA
STRING: She continued.

LABEL: 0xAF76
STRING: 「Maybe they cut off contact with us.」

LABEL: 0xAFC3
STRING: 「What does that mean?」

LABEL: 0xAFF2
STRING: Touri interjected.

LABEL: 0xB00E
STRING: Reiri glanced sideways at her sister, then averted her eyes in annoyance.

LABEL: 0xB0C2
STRING: 「I'll put it so even Touri can understand.」

LABEL: 0xB0F8
STRING: 「In other words...」

LABEL: 0xB16F
STRING: 「This ship

LABEL: 0xB184
STRING: has been abandoned.」

LABEL: 0xB1AF
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0xB27A
STRING: I turned around at the loud noise and saw Yukari slamming her fist into the wall.

LABEL: 0xB387
STRING: 「That can't be!」

LABEL: 0xB3B1
STRING: 「They said that the rescue ship was on its way!」

LABEL: 0xB446
STRING: 「Please refrain from saying things like that, Reiri-san!」

LABEL: 0xB4E7
STRING: 「So, there's no need to worry, Touri-san.」

LABEL: 0xB536
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0xB555
STRING: Yukari smiled at Touri.

LABEL: 0xB5B3
STRING: I heard Reiri, who was right next to me,

LABEL: 0xB5ED
STRING: let out a small laugh.

LABEL: 0xB6E2
STRING: 「What's so funny?」

LABEL: 0xB780
STRING: 「Just about everything.」

LABEL: 0xB79C
STRING: 「1155 people.」

LABEL: 0xB7B4
STRING: 「Do you know what that number is?」

LABEL: 0xB7E2
STRING: 「The Toya Maru accident, the worst tragedy in Japan's maritime history, occurred in 1954.」

LABEL: 0xB826
STRING: 「That's the number of its victims.」

LABEL: 0xB859
STRING: 「That's terrible... So many people.」

LABEL: 0xB8EF
STRING: 「Of course, there were many factors that led to such a disaster.」

LABEL: 0xB935
STRING: 「The delay in setting sail, the fatal flaw in the deck structure, the captain's misjudgment...」

LABEL: 0xB97B
STRING: 「But, that alone wasn't enough to cause that many casualties.」

LABEL: 0xBA1E
STRING: 「The cause of that tragedy... was the delay in rescue.」

LABEL: 0xBA56
STRING: 「An SOS was sent out, and the passengers continued to wait for a rescue ship during a storm. However, before the response to the SOS arrived――」

LABEL: 0xBAC0
STRING: 「The Toya Maru had sunk to the bottom of the strait.」

LABEL: 0xBAF3
STRING: As she spoke, Reiri raised her index finger and pointed at Yukari's chest.

LABEL: 0xBB40
STRING: 「Even if temporary, as the one in charge of this ship, you should understand, right?」

LABEL: 0xBB76
STRING: 「During a maritime accident, the most important thing is the initial response―how quickly rescue operations can begin.」

LABEL: 0xBC2B
STRING: 「If they truly wanted to help us,

LABEL: 0xBC63
STRING: they would have come earlier.」

LABEL: 0xBC93
STRING: 「Is the rescue ship really coming for us?」

LABEL: 0xBD37
STRING: 「It is!」

LABEL: 0xBD58
STRING: Yukari answered immediately.

LABEL: 0xBD7E
STRING: Reiri's face twisted in an ugly manner.

LABEL: 0xBE6D
STRING: 「What makes you so sure?」

LABEL: 0xBE96
STRING: 「You weren't here for the transmission earlier!!」

LABEL: 0xBEE1
STRING: 「That's true, I didn't hear what was said, but...」

LABEL: 0xBF66
STRING: 「It must be a blessing to be able to trust their words that much.」

LABEL: 0xC01C
STRING: 「...Then what do you want us to do!?」

LABEL: 0xC061
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0xC079
STRING: 「It's your job as adults to think about that.」

LABEL: 0xC0BA
STRING: 「That's why I'm telling us to wait for the rescue ship!」

LABEL: 0xC10B
STRING: 「That's just giving up thinking entirely.」

LABEL: 0xC146
STRING: 「Then――」

LABEL: 0xC171
STRING: 「Momoi, wait!」

LABEL: 0xC1CC
STRING: Hiragino grabbed Yukari's shoulder as she leaned forward.

LABEL: 0xC1FA
STRING: He scolded her for losing her cool and getting played by Reiri.

LABEL: 0xC307
STRING: 「What's the point of having a falling out here?」

LABEL: 0xC340
STRING: 「That's...

LABEL: 0xC3AF
STRING: You're right, but...」

LABEL: 0xC3DC
STRING: 「You understand too, don't you, Reiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0xC417
STRING: 「I just said what I had to say.」

LABEL: 0xC449
STRING: 「For your sake.」

LABEL: 0xC4A8
STRING: Reiri shut up after that.

LABEL: 0xC4D2
STRING: And so, the argument was abandoned and left hanging in the air.

LABEL: 0xC530
STRING: No one said anything.

LABEL: 0xC550
STRING: It had been a while since we had all gathered together, so this tense atmosphere was...

LABEL: 0xC600
STRING: 「Now, now, everyone.」

LABEL: 0xC624
STRING: 「This is a major event.」

LABEL: 0xC650
STRING: 「Let's just sit back and relax.」

LABEL: 0xC681
STRING: You could always count on Tokiwa to not read the mood, no matter the situation.

LABEL: 0xC6BB
STRING: I was involuntarily impressed by her eccentric nature.

LABEL: 0xC719
STRING: However, this was a rare occurrence where her unchanging nature was actually helpful.

LABEL: 0xC769
STRING: The atmosphere had relaxed a bit thanks to her... or so I felt at least.

LABEL: 0xC7A7
STRING: Everyone followed Tokiwa's example and faced the window.

LABEL: 0xC7D9
STRING: It was true that we couldn't see this kind of scene very often.

LABEL: 0xC83F
STRING: The lights gradually lost their momentum.

LABEL: 0xC869
STRING: It didn't end all at once. It was like a wave, swaying back and forth.

LABEL: 0xC8CA
STRING: 「Ohhhhhhhhh...」

LABEL: 0xC8F1
STRING: The lights, weakening over time, resembled the afterglow of a sunset being replaced with night.

LABEL: 0xCA14
STRING: 「This light... What is it?」

LABEL: 0xCA4D
STRING: 「This is the first time I've seen such a phenomenon, too.」

LABEL: 0xCA7F
STRING: 「Deep sea really is a natural wonder of the highest order.」

LABEL: 0xCAF8
STRING: 「The highest school!」

LABEL: 0xCB6E
STRING: 「A shogunate!」

LABEL: 0xCBC8
STRING: With everyone watching,

LABEL: 0xCBE6
STRING: the lights slowly faded away

LABEL: 0xCC12
STRING: and only darkness remained.
